java_home_description: Specifies the folder path to the Java 8 runtime used to launch the Apex Language Server (for example, /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.8.0_131.jdk/Contents/Home).
apex_rename_description: Enable Apex rename capabilities. This beta feature is auto-enabled in Visual Studio Code - Insiders; set this flag to enable the feature in Visual Studio Code. As a beta feature, this feature is a preview and isn’t part of the “Services” under your master subscription agreement with Salesforce. apex_semantic_errors_description: Allow Apex Language Server to surface semantic errors.
